Head Blacksmith Ferris:
Have you ever heard about Spirit Crystals? People find those quite often in Aden lately. As some elders and blacksmiths say, those crystals have the power to upgrade items.
One of the elders, who had used such crystal, taught me to use this power. So I can help you to upgrade your items!
Different materials are needed for an upgrade depending on the type and level of the item.
